course.title: MCA
course.description: The MCA course is a full-time two years (four semesters) Master Degree in Computer Application. The degree helps interested students in setting up a sound academic base for an advanced career in Computer Applications.

course.title: B.Tech
course.description: The B.Tech course is a full-time four years (eight semesters) undergraduate Degree in Computer Application. The degree helps interested students in setting up a sound academic base for an advanced career in Computer Applications.

course.title: M.Tech
course.description: The M.Tech is a postgraduate degree course in computer applications for a duration of 2 years. The field relates to the design, development, and use of computer applications.
